meanings.definition: The state of being able to move easily and freely beyond normal limits.
meanings.sent1: Her hypermobilities allowed her to excel in gymnastics.
meanings.sent2: The dancer's hypermobilities made her performances graceful and effortless.
meanings.sent3: His hypermobilities were so extreme that he could bend like a pretzel!
meanings.sent4: The hypermobilities of the cheetah are unmatched in the animal kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's hypermobilities enabled him to dodge attacks with incredible agility.

meanings.definition: The quality of being excessively flexible or mobile.
meanings.sent1: The contortionist's hypermobilities amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: Yoga helps improve hypermobilities in joints.
meanings.sent3: The hypermobilities of the rubber band were put to the test.
meanings.sent4: Her hypermobilities in negotiation made her a formidable businesswoman.
meanings.sent5: The hypermobilities of the acrobat were a sight to behold under the big top.
